Comments.Message:
There's just one "major" issue with it that I didn't quite know how to fix: the ghoul doesn't quite do enough damage. Maybe you know better then me about how do calculate it.

I chose 16.7 as AP divisor and 101.3 as the weapon base damage because it worked for the numbers I had...the problem is the Attack Speed. For some reason my Ghoul attacks a lot faster then it should and i don't quite know why.

Regards

Indaril
Hmm... Why don't you just join the dev team, Indaril? Send me an IM (cnervig@hotmail.com on MSN, Astro tSD on AIM).

Attached is my merge of your changes with mine, which, in addition to what you've done, improves the ghoul's math, fixes up armor penetration, normalizes instant attacks, supports glyph of oblit, and somewhat cleans up the buffs tab.
